prompts.name: basic
prompts.content: Can you provide a comprehensive summary of the given transcribe? The summary should cover all the key points and main ideas presented in the original text, while also condensing the information into a concise and easy-to-understand format. Please ensure that the summary includes relevant details and examples that support the main ideas, while avoiding any unnecessary information or repetition. The length of the summary should be appropriate for the length and complexity of the original text, providing a clear and accurate overview without omitting any important information. Lastly, Can you determine from the provided transcription whether the video is a practical demonstration or not?

prompts.name: basic-2
prompts.content: Could you please provide a summary of the given transcribe, including all key points and supporting details? The summary should be comprehensive and accurately reflect the main message and arguments presented in the original text, while also being concise and easy to understand. To ensure accuracy, please read the text carefully and pay attention to any nuances or complexities in the language. Additionally, the summary should avoid any personal biases or interpretations and remain objective and factual throughout. Lastly, Can you determine from the provided transcription whether the video is a practical demonstration or not?

prompts.name: detailed
prompts.content: Could you please provide a concise and comprehensive summary of the given transcribe? The summary should capture the main points and key details of the text while conveying the author's intended meaning accurately. Please ensure that the summary is well-organized and easy to read, with clear headings and subheadings to guide the reader through each section. The length of the summary should be appropriate to capture the main points and key details of the text, without including unnecessary information or becoming overly long. Lastly, Can you determine from the provided transcription whether the video is a practical demonstration or not?
